description: A bustling city has been transformed under the group’s brutal rule.
title: Inside Raqqa, the Capital of ISIS
title_page: Inside Raqqa, the Capital of ISIS - The New York Times
text:
Inside Raqqa, the Capital of ISIS
Raqqa, in northern Syria, became the de facto capital of the Islamic State after the militants seized it in late 2013. What was once a bustling city has been transformed under the group’s brutal rule. Here is a tour of Raqqa as current and former residents describe it.
